faqs.question: Does Rayalaseema University provide any financial assistance to its students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the university provides scholarships to students on the basis of their economic background. The fee reimbursement facility is offered to those candidates whose family income is less than INR 2,00,000 per annum for SC/ST (INR 1,00,000 for BC/EBC categories). The university also provides scholarships to meritorious students under government policies and regulations.

faqs.question: What are the facilities Rayalaseema University offers?
faqs.answer: Ans.Rayalaseema University provides various facilities to its students. The university provides facilities including Hostels, Gym, Library, Laboratories, Sports, Cafeteria, Auditorium, Medical facilities, and so on.

faqs.question: What are the courses Rayalaseema University offers?
faqs.answer: Ans.Rayalaseema University offers various postgraduate courses in the field of Arts, Commerce, Science, Management, Education, Computer Science along with M.Phil and Ph.D. under the research level. Apart from these, the university also offers some undergraduate courses through distance mode.

faqs.question: What are the documents required at the time of admission to Rayalaseema University?
faqs.answer: Ans.Following documents are required at the time of admission at Rayalaseema University:Hall-Ticket Number of Qualifying ExaminationDate of the Birth certificate as mentioned in the 10th certificateCaste certificatePH, NCC, NSS, Sports, or CAP statusStudy or Residence (from M.R.O) or relevant certificate for proof of local status

faqs.question: How to check the result of Rayalaseema University?
faqs.answer: Ans.The necessary steps to check the results are as follows:Visit the official website of the universityClick on the Examination Tab and then click on ResultsClick on the relevant link on the new webpageEnter your Hall Ticket number and CAPTCHA code prompted by the websiteClick Submit to view and download the Result

Section.name: About Rayalaseema University
Section.description:
Rayalaseema University is a state university located in Kurnool, Andhra Pradesh. The university is approved by UGC and accredited with NAAC with a grade of ‘B’.
The institute offers various full-time courses under the postgraduate level in 15 departments with a duration of 2 years. Additionally, the institute also has a Directorate of Distance Education that provides only undergraduate courses.
Admissions to all courses are based on the merit achieved in the qualifying examination, as well as the scores achieved in the RUPGCET. Applications are accepted through online mode only. Various reputed companies like Tech Mahindra, Wipro, ICICI Bank, and many more visited the campus for recruitments.
Rayalaseema University provides various scholarships to its students enrolling in such courses. The university provides scholarships to deserving candidates on the basis of merit, financially needy students. Govt. of India & Govt. of Andhra Pradesh also provided scholarships to the students.
Read More: Rayalaseema University Reviews
2.1 How to Apply?
Rayalaseema University offers M.Sc, M.A, MBA, M.Com, MCA, and M.Ed at the PG level in full-time mode. The details of the courses are mentioned below.

Ques. Does Rayalaseema University provide any financial assistance to its students?
Ans. Yes, the university provides scholarships to students on the basis of their economic background. The fee reimbursement facility is offered to those candidates whose family income is less than INR 2,00,000 per annum for SC/ST (INR 1,00,000 for BC/EBC categories). The university also provides scholarships to meritorious students under government policies and regulations.
Ques. What are the facilities Rayalaseema University offers?
Ans. Rayalaseema University provides various facilities to its students. The university provides facilities including Hostels, Gym, Library, Laboratories, Sports, Cafeteria, Auditorium, Medical facilities, and so on.
Ques. What are the courses Rayalaseema University offers?
Ans. Rayalaseema University offers various postgraduate courses in the field of Arts, Commerce, Science, Management, Education, Computer Science along with M.Phil and Ph.D. under the research level. Apart from these, the university also offers some undergraduate courses through distance mode.
